Which Plan Is Right For You?

We offer an assortment of plans ranging from single sessions to monthly subscriptions. Each plan has unique perks!

Single Session

Looking to see what we have to offer? A single session with the professional of your choice is a great option!

We offer a single session that lasts one hour, for as low as $50!
